result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 1:10 PM Defendant Juan M Bautista IV in court, in custody.  Attorney Leonie Dolch in court for Juan M Bautista IV.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Delain in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Dolch states joint recommendation.  State agrees.  Matter dismissed but read in.

1:27 PM Defendant Juan M Bautista IV in court, in custody.  Attorney Leonie Dolch in court for Juan M Bautista IV.  Prosecuting attorney Michael X. Albrecht in court for the State of Wisconsin. Prepared to resolve but victim notification needs to be done.  Put all on next week for plea.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:42 PM Defendant Juan M Bautista IV appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger appeared by video for Juan M Bautista IV.  Prosecuting attorney Emily Eklund in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states cases and appearances.  Atty Getsinger makes record re: DE's nonappearance in this case, states it was due to transportation issues.  State makes bail argument.  Atty Getsginer responds.  Court orders previous signature bond reinstated.  Yesterday's case, 22CM394, is amended to $500.00 signature bond w/any conditions to be continued as previously ordered.

DE qualifies for PD representation.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  State requests a cash bond.  Atty Hayes requests a signature bond.  $500.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: No possession or consumption of alcohol.  No  contact with Juan M. Bautista III.
